## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-scheduledagvliw-cpp-/scheduledagvliw">ScheduleDAGVLIW</a> - The actual DFA list scheduler implementation.

This supports / top-down scheduling.

Definition at line 47 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagvliw-cpp">ScheduleDAGVLIW.cpp</a>.

### releaseSucc() {#ab821fd41ed170899d33452e3962329a2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ScheduleDAGVLIW::releaseSucc (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42; SU, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp; D)</>}>
releaseSucc - Decrement the NumPredsLeft count of a successor.

Add it to the PendingQueue if the count reaches zero. Also update its cycle bound.

### scheduleNodeTopDown() {#a3f45c321ff664229564d6e1e5bfae723}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ScheduleDAGVLIW::scheduleNodeTopDown (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42; SU, unsigned CurCycle)</>}>
scheduleNodeTopDown - Add the node to the schedule.

Decrement the pending count of its successors. If a successor pending count is zero, add it to the Available queue.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagvliw-cpp/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagvliw-cpp">ScheduleDAGVLIW.cpp</a>.

### PendingQueue {#ac61a0d65d30914923618b15ae3dec74d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;SUnit&#42;&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ScheduleDAGVLIW.cpp&#125;::ScheduleDAGVLIW::PendingQueue</>}>
PendingQueue - This contains all of the instructions whose operands have been issued, but their results are not ready yet (due to the latency of the operation).

Once the operands become available, the instruction is added to the AvailableQueue.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagvliw-cpp/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/scheduledagvliw-cpp">ScheduleDAGVLIW.cpp</a>.
